a string containing the name of the problem

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: lmitool(filename) is used to redefine interactively a LMI problem, filename must have been initially generated by lmitool. In the non interactive mode, txt=lmitool(probname,varlist,datalist) generates a file in the current directory. The name of this file is obtained by adding .sci to the end of probname. This file is the skeleton of a solver function and the corresponding evaluation function needed by lmisolver.
